p: Values are summarized as medians and interquartile ranges (IQR). Wilcoxon’s signed rank test was used to evaluate intraindividual changes from baseline to repeat syphilis. Spearman’s correlation was used to assess if there was an association between the number of prior episodes of syphilis and plasma cytokine and chemokine concentrations at the time of syphilis diagnosis (baseline and repeat infections combined, N = 22). All analyses were performed in Stata 13 (StataCorp LP, College Station, TX, USA). Due to the small sample size we did not conduct multivariable analyses.
